subject: p14147380
History: Assess for fluid overload. Patient Post multiple abdominal surgeries. Comparison is made with prior study, .
Findings: There are low lung volumes. Bibasilar atelectasis have minimally improved. Mild vascular congestion has minimally improved. There are no new lung abnormalities or pneumothorax. Bilateral pleural effusions are small. Right PICC tip is at the cavoatrial junction.
